author: Michael D. Shear, Richard Pérez-Peña, Zolan Kanno-Youngs, Anton Troianovski
title: U.S. and Allies Impose Sanctions on Russia as Biden Condemns ‘Invasion’ of Ukraine
description: President Biden warned President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia that more sanctions would follow if he did not withdraw his forces and engage in diplomatic efforts to resolve the crisis.
content: Financial markets around the world wobbled on Tuesday in the wake of the Russian actions and the response from Western governments. In the United States, the news pushed stocks lower, leaving the S&a… [+2053 chars]
